name: Rotten Thumb
description:
WASD to move

Walk over Sword, Sickle or Watering can to pick up

Press E to drop carried item

Kill villagers with the sword

Water plants with the watering can

Harvest plants and increase your score with the sickle

Villagers attacking you cost you 10 health per villager

Made for https://itch.io/jam/ryans-lil-jam
